summary: The diff does not implement production deployment or any deployment-output changes to print the required .icp0.io URL line. It mainly updates backend canister code and updates project_state.json to track the requests as pending.

missing_requirements.requirement: Perform a production deployment (not a preview build) so the app is accessible publicly, and provide the final public frontend URL in the deployment output in the exact format: "Your production canister is live at: https://<canister-id>.icp0.io".
missing_requirements.reason: No changes in the diff indicate a production deployment was executed or that deployment output was modified to print the exact required line/URL format. The only related mention is in project_state.json where the request is marked pending.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the deployment feedback/output so that production deployments reliably include the final public .icp0.io live link line.
missing_requirements.reason: There are no modifications to deployment tooling, scripts, CI, or output formatting shown in the diff. project_state.json notes the issue but does not implement a fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister domain logic additions/changes (classes/courses/students/teachers/lessons/subscription/access-control helpers) unrelated to deployment output visibility.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly exclude implementing new product features beyond deployment/output visibility; the backend code changes appear to add/modify application domain functionality rather than deployment behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Tracking the deployment requests as pending feature requests in project_state.json without implementing them.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks to deploy and fix output; updating internal project tracking is not requested as a deliverable and does not satisfy the deployment/output requirements.
